marklogic.body:
Good morning, dads.
Maybe it's not a bad thing to wait a few days more. Looks like the Yanks held on a decision about Pineda, and it appears that he is now having shoulder issues.
I think being either the GM or the field manager in baseball is a tough job. Neither office has a crystal ball, and it's tough to project out over the course of a season how well a player will (or will not) perform. Glad I am a supportive fan who doesn't have to feel the Heat for poor player management decisions. I don't think I would last long in either position, but it's sure fun to be a recliner GM ... :)
